review: Three missions for $15 LOL what is this I paid $40 and only got called a clown via a Sombra skin. Greedy game, terrible micro transaction prices, false advertising. Just wait for Marathon or something else this is NOT it.
you know the game is shit when the devs came crawling to gaben, pleading to release ow2 on steam
This game is a mockery of what Overwatch used to be

I played over 500 hours of Overwatch, this game took a huge fall when they decided that instead of updating the game they are going to make a sequel, it would have been much better off had they just shown love to the game instead of trying to make a worthless crash grab, extenuating power creep with every single hero they release AND putting them behind a paywall.

Played since beta from ps4 to pc with about 4000+ hours total. Weird to say it, but i grew up with this game. OW1 in the first 10 seasons was amazing, everyone would run around with their heads cut off and people were toxic but everyone still cared about winning. But you play it now and it just hurts to see how far its fallen. I was GM since OW1 season 2 and playing at the highest elo was the most fun but once season 10 started and brig entered the scene. THE GAME WAS NO LONGER COMPETITIVE... BRIG TOOK AWAY ANY COMPETITIVENESS this game had. Ever since then... overwatch has been trying to be something its not. its not a competitve game anymore and it should stop trying to be one. 

This game is a shell of what it once was. OW2 ripped out whatever soul this game still had. They took away 6v6. They took away the game i loved. And its so sad that I can never play that game again. All I have is this... but it really isnt enough

I'm still gonna give this game a positive review. Out of respect of what it once was.
